h2_title: Where to Find the Whiteclad Noble
content: You'll find him at the bottom of the ramp across a large flooded marsh area lined with reeds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Whiteclad_Noble.md', within the main section titled 'Whiteclad Noble', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Whiteclad Noble'.
The content is as follows:
You'll find him at the bottom of the ramp across a large flooded marsh area lined with reeds.
